The main attraction of Happy Chick is the fact that you can download the games directly from its catalog, so you dont have to use a separate tool to end up downloading files that may not even work. Plus, it lets you download Android games through its own servers. This emulator pack lets you enjoy all the classic games you can think of. Happy Chick makes it easy to find games, adapt the screen, and play with the onscreen controls or with any controller by connecting it via Bluetooth.
